alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 10:48AM CDT until April 12 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at New Harmony affecting Gibson, Posey, Wabash, White and Gallatin Counties. .The Wabash River will crest this afternoon and then begin a slow fall. It will fall below flood stage on April 12. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY, APRIL 12... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, April 12. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday, April 12. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
